Articles.Content:
Ever since I downloaded KSP 1.0 and above, I have been having problems with connecting parts. For example, a parachute won't connect with the top of the ship:

http://prntscr.com/739fm0

I would be happy if someone could tell me how to get parts to connect again.
Hi FJB, please see the support stickies and provide your game logs

Connecting parts now uses slightly different logic. Try moving the mouse up away from the connection noce a little and see if that helps. The red no-connect is even more of an issue with smaller parts.

Cheers,

-Claw
